m_szDocTitle: Hyundai to sponsor hydrogen cars-INSIDE Korea JoongAng Daily
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Hyundai to sponsor hydrogen cars Sept 13,2016 Joo Hyung-hwan, Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy, takes a look at a hydrogen-fueled taxi on Monday at a convention center in Sejong. [NEWSIS] Taxis running on hydrogen fuel cell electricity will hit the road in Ulsan for the first time in Korea starting in November. A car-sharing service that only uses the eco-friendly vehicles will also launch the same month in Gwangju. Hyundai Motor will supply the necessary vehicles.
